forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 17C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 61F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 19C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 66F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 63F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 61F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
